title: Being in touch
brief_description: This film considers the topic of baby massage and its contribution to healthy child development. Takes a look at the importance given to baby massage in other cultures: India, Nigeria, Tahiti, as well as the growing recognition of baby massage in Australia. Suitable for upper secondary level.
